name: Rouladen-Flavored Pot Roast
ingredients: 1 large onion, thickly sliced in rings, 5 ounces

instructions.en: Line a 9x13" baking pan with heavy duty foil.
Place the roast in the pan and rub half of the mustard over the top. Season with salt, pepper and half of the onion soup mix. Turn the roast over and repeat on the other side.
Scatter the onion rings over the top, then scatter the pieces of bacon over the onions.
In a measuring cup, heat the water until boiling. Add the wine and bouillon; stir until the bouillon has dissolved.
Pour the liquid mixture around the meat.
If using carrots, peel and cut them into large chunks. Arrange around the roast and season lightly with salt and pepper.
Cover tightly with foil and roast at 325Â°F for 3-4 hours.
Remove the foil and roast another 30-60 minutes to brown the onions and bacon.

notes: This recipe makes about 6 servings. The dish can be frozen. *Carrots are optional and not included in the nutritional counts.
